title: What is Quick Switch Adaptor USB-A output?
content:
There is a "Quick Switch Adaptor" in the Pixel 3 box, from USB-C to USB-A.

If I plan to charge devices with the provided "18 W/2 A USB type-C charger" using the "Quick Switch Adaptor", what is A/V and W coming out of the USB-A plug? Is it USB-A 2.0, USB-A 3.0, does it support Quick Charge 2.0 ou 3.0 or...?
